title: Longjing Green Tea
description: Premium Dragon Well green tea from Hangzhou, known for its flat appearance and sweet, delicate flavor.
longDescription: Longjing (Dragon Well) is one of China's most prestigious green teas, dating back over 1,200 years. Grown in the mountains surrounding West Lake in Hangzhou, this tea is pan-fired by hand in traditional woks to create its distinctive flat, sword-like shape. The leaves produce a clear, yellow-green infusion with a gentle, sweet aroma reminiscent of roasted chestnuts. The flavor is mellow and smooth with notes of fresh vegetables and a slight sweetness, ending with a clean finish.
brewingInstructions: Use water at 175°F (80°C). Steep for 2-3 minutes. Can be infused multiple times.

reviews.author: Tea Enthusiast
reviews.comment: Exceptional quality Dragon Well. The nutty aroma and sweet flavor are exactly what I look for in a premium Longjing.

reviews.author: Green Tea Lover
reviews.comment: Very good quality with the classic Longjing profile. Fresh harvest with vibrant flavor.
